summary: An ordinance providing for the payment of the cost and expense of the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Forty-second Avenue South for the changing and establishing of curb grades on Forty-second Avenue South, and for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, as provided for in Ordinance No. 37066, of the City of Seattle by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor.
